function.name: generate_legal_document
function.description: Generate a professional, court-compliant legal document. Supports multiple document types including Notice-to-Quit Response, ADA Accommodation Request, Ledger Dispute, Emergency Stay Motion, Affidavit of Truth, Trust Resolution, Proof of Service, Exhibits, Hearing Scripts, and Filing Checklists. Returns the document in requested formats (PDF and/or DOCX).

document_type.description: Type of legal document to generate

landlord_name.description: Landlord's name or property management company

trial_date.description: Scheduled trial date in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD)

disability_status.description: Description of any disability status for ADA compliance

trust_involved.description: Whether the ISIAH TARIK HOWARD TRUST is involved (default: true)

ada_notes.description: Notes related to ADA accommodations or requests

ledger_dispute_details.description: Details of any ledger or payment disputes

service_issues.description: Any issues with service of process

exhibit_label.description: Label for exhibit (A, B, C, etc.)

header_footer_style.description: Header/footer style. Style B: black header, gold footer

documents.description: Array of generated document objects with file paths and URLs
